Pre-Game Insights: Congo DR are yet to win a game in Cote d'Ivoire and rely on penalties for progression.
Guinea ended a losing run in the competition's first knockout stage by defeating Equatorial Guinea.
DR Congo's midfield man Edo Kayembe has missed every game at the Cup of Nations.
Guinea's top striker Serhou Guirassy is absent, weakening their potency up top.
DR Congo's potential starting lineup includes key players like Yoane Wissa and Cedric Bakambu.
Guinea's possible starting lineup features players like Kone, Diakite, and Diawara.
